TopicTitle: Missing/deleted landing legs- where did they go?

Articles.Content: I've recently noticed/remembered, while building a lightweight lander, that one of the stock landing leg parts has disappeared. I can't remember its name, but they were the simple ones that just unfolded through about 120 degrees from an upright position- like the large LT-2 legs, but smaller and not telescopic. They've probably been gone for a while now, but I've just not been paying attention. What's the story here?

Thats the old Model of the LT-1 Landing Strut

Not my Picture

They got remodelled in .22

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/LT-1_Landing_Struts
